name: Mara Sara Total Conversion
description:
Its a 3v3 map,

Everyone gets 4 bases, 4 Island bases, The 4th base is harder to protect put cannons, bunkers, spine crawlers 2 Xel'Naga towers with site blockers so noone can see the back expan is the rich minerals with rocks middle bases have 4 doors keep in mind that put cannons, bunkers, spine crawlers in all doors

Please comment and send me a pm for ideas? it would be help full.
